name: Dinari IBIT
description: The Dinari IBIT dShares token (IBIT.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in the iShares Bitcoin Trust (IBIT), a regulated financial product that provides secure exposure to Bitcoin. Each IBIT.d token is fully collateralized by a corresponding share of the iShares Bitcoin Trust held securely in a transparent and auditable treasury. Leveraging blockchain technology, IBIT.d offers investors seamless access to Bitcoin exposure through a compliant, trusted investment vehicle, enabling 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity.
